title: Print, "Upholstered Furniture", ca. 1700
medium: Etching and black ink on white laid paper
signed: Signed on plate, lower left: Marot in: et fecit avec Previllege des Etats generaux et d'hollande We [---] frisse.
inscribed: Inscribed in plate, counterclockwise: Rideau gallonnee/ Differents Rideau de Croissees/ Tabourets Tournee.
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: Designs for upholstered furniture. Pictured are three different types of chairs with footstools and four different designs for window dressings. There are labels throughout the work.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Upholstered Furniture", ca. 1700.
ca. 1700. Etching and black ink on white laid paper. Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund. 1988-4-57.
